actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Federal Communications Commission to proscribe all obscene and indecent material transmitted by means of intrastate telephone communications by amending section 223 of the Communications Act of 1934.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to impose criminal penalties for making obscene or indecent intrastate telephone communications for commercial purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Federal Communications Commission to proscribe all obscene and indecent material transmitted by means of intrastate telephone communications by amending section 223 of the Communications Act of 1934.
